author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
How much work work did Jamie and Adam do behind the scenes on MythBusters before the show got popular? How should a parent introduce their creative passions to their kids without forcing or overwhelming them? Is there a time Adam had to admit to his parents he'd messed up? Did Adam make an error prototyping his machine labels? In this live stream excerpt Adam answers these questions from Tested members Lee Marsh, Chris Baginski, Silver Defender and Clanreignfire, whom we thank for their support.

Join this channel to support Tested and get access to perks, like asking Adam a question:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiDJtJKMICpb9B1qf7qjEOA/join
00:00 Early MythBusters
01:48 Introducing creative passions to kids
06:06 Admitting you messed up
10:04 Reefing down on the bolts
Adam Savage Prototypes Workshop Machine Labels with UV Printing: https://youtu.be/GJUW6IZtiCc

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=t
title: A Myth About MythBusters BUSTED
